description.text: The aim of this submodule is to represent Agents running on SDN managed resources (i.e., NetDevAgentService, NetSlicerAgentService, NOSAgentService, NetAppAgentService and NetInterAsAgentService).

reference.text: RFC 7950 - The YANG 1.1 Data Modeling Language

description.text: The AgentService represents an Agent running on SDN managed resources, such as NetDev, NetSlicer, NOS and NetApp.
Inherits the defintion of AgentService, it is related to the Agent for the NetApps in the Application Plane.
Inherits the defintion of AgentService, it is related to the Agent for the NOS in the Control Plane.
Inherits the defintion of AgentService, it is related to the Agent for the Slicers in the Control Plane.
Inherits the defintion of AgentService, it is related to the Agent for the InterAS in the Control Plane.
Inherits the defintion of AgentService, it is related to the Agent for the NetDevs in the Data Plane.
Models the communication point from AgentServices to AdapterServices by the ServiceAccessPoint tagged as ManagementInterface.
Models the communication point from AgentServices to AdapterServices by the ServiceAccessPoint tagged as ManagementInterface.
Represents the relationship between ProcessIndications and AgentServices with by referring to the Notification identity.
Both the AgentProtocol from the AgentService and the ManageProtocol from the AdapterService define the communication protocol.
Identifies the parameter to access the communication.
Defines the maximum number of concurrent connections supported.
